title: Til sölu programer í GM Duramax

posts.text:
Til sölu tölvukubbur í GM Duramax 01-04 það er búið að unlocka race programinu. Designed for the Duramax Diesel Tuning up your Duramax Diesel is simply done when you plug in the new Intimidator from BD into your OBD port. You can increase your power by: 55 RWHP / 110 lbs. torque! 80 RWHP / 200 lbs. torque! 100 RWHP / 205 lbs. torque! Plus, a race-only level of 170 RWHP / 350 lbs. torque is built into each unit and can be unlocked with the purchase of an optional power code. This unit does more than just give you power; it also removes the top-speed limit control, sets your odometer for correct road speed if you have oversize tires, plus, it reads and clears engine trouble codes. You can also set the transmission to Quick learn Uppl í s:860-6323 e-mail 
horri800@live.com
 v:45 þús
